name: RoboPup Goes To Puppyland
description:
ROBOPUP GOES TO PUPPYLAND

You are a discarded automaton with the unique ability to consume biomatter and converting it into fuel which keeps you operational. Other than that you are not sure who you are, or why you are here, but you know ONE THING. There is a place called PUPPYLAND, and that is where you must go to be with all the other little puppers who are just like you.

Made in 72 hours for LUDUM DARE 51 (2022).

How To Play
  • Consume all the biomatter on a level to complete it. Each completed level takes you one step closer to Puppyland. 
  • Each consumed body of biomatter converts to 10 seconds worth of fuel, which means you'll have to consume a body at least every 10 seconds in order to avoid critical operational failure.
  • Use a variety of actions such as e.g. dashing and spawning of bone blocks to progress and traverse through the environment. If you are unsure how to proceed you can try activating the "sleep mode" to scout your surroundings.

Note: This game is best experienced with a gamepad, but keyboard input is also supported.
